title: Advanced Wireless LAN - 1st Edition (2012).pdf Gooner
description:
Advanced Wireless LAN - 1st Edition (2012).pdf Gooner

Publisher: InTeO; 2012 1st edition 
Language: English
ISBN-10: 9535106456
ISBN-13: 9789535106456

This book presents some of the latest development status of wireless LAN, covering the topics on physical layer, MAC layer, QoS and systems. It provides an opportunity for both practitioners and researchers to explore the problems that arise in the rapidly developed technologies in wireless LAN.

The past two decades have witnessed starling advances in wireless LAN technologies that were stimulated by its increasing popularity in the home due to ease of installation, and in commercial complexes offering wireless access to their customers.

Contents:

Preface
1 Sum-Product Decoding of Punctured Convolutional Code for Wireless LAN
2 A MAC Throughput in the Wireless LAN
3 MAC-Layer QoS Evaluation Metrics for IEEE 802.11e-EDCF Protocol over Nodes' Mobility Constraints
4 Techniques for Preserving QoS Performance in Contention-Based IEEE 802.11e Networks
5 QoS Adaptation for Realizing Interaction Between Virtual and Real Worlds Through Wireless LAN
6 Custom CMOS Image Sensor with Multi-Channel High-Speed Readout Dedicated to WDM-SDM Indoor Optical Wireless LAN
